name: Doodly Social Canva Template
description: Unleash Your Imagination with Notion Doodly Style Canva Template!Elevate Your Content with Whimsical Instagram Post and Story Templates + Bonus Illustration Pack!It's time to take your content to the next level with our brand new Canva template, inspired by the enchanting Notion Doodly Style! Whether you're a creator, blogger, influencer, or small business owner, this magical template is designed to bring your ideas to life with its artistic charm and playful aesthetics.What's Included 11 Instag
features: 11 Instagram Post 1080x1080; 11 Instagram Story 1080x1920; 16 Illustrations in Hand drawn Notion style; Editable in Canva; Easy customizable
